attributes.action: scrap any idea of bringing in long distance average speed cameras.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the british motoring public have heard all of the excuses for all types of cameras.
as far as were concerned its another cash raising exersize and no amount of government spin or statistics will perswade us otherwise.
i call on gordon brown not to cripple the british motorist with another unfair tax on top of the struggle with the credit crunch

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
